=== Merges (done) ===

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| '''Package'''
| '''Rationale'''
|-
| mousepad
| xfprint4 demoted to help some arm folks (long time ago, not sure it's still useful, but keep it anyway), and a patch for mru files
|-
| thunar-media-tags-plugin
| (+really) will be solved next upstream release
|-
| tumbler
| delta wrt ffmpeg's exclusion from the isos. Currently, there's a new gstreamer thumbnailer in master, so we'll redo the package split for the next upstream release, and it'll be syncable
|-
| xfburn
| minor desktop file fixes from/for lubuntu (reported upstream)
|-
| xfce4-cellmodem-plugin
| extra .dfsg in ubuntu, will be solved next upstream release
|-
| xfce4-genmon-plugin
| ochosi's delta for "meaningful icons" (already reported upstream)
|-
| xfce4-indicator-plugin
| patch to exclude some indicators
|-
| xfce4-mixer
| Extra epoch in Ubuntu, needs manual resync ad vitam aeternam
|-
| xfce4-notes-plugin
| patch to fix the upgrade path to 4.8, more or less in upstream git/bugzilla (keep until next LTS)
|-
| xfce4-panel
| patch to support xubuntu derivatives (so they don't need to use dpkg-divert nor update-alternatives)
|-
| xfce4-session
| accessibility/gnome support, extra patch for an ubuntu gdm change, and extra patch to lock the screen on hibernate/suspend
|-
| xfce4-systemload-plugin
| Extra epoch in Ubuntu, needs manual resync ad vitam aeternam
|-
| xfce4-timer-plugin
| ochosi's delta for "meaningful icons" (needs to be reported upstream)
|-
| xfdesktop4
| the brilliant gtk+2 resize grip epic fail of the design team
|}
